source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Beginners Guide to Painting Watercolour Skies
items.headline: Paint 8 different watercolour skies in one course.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will have eight original watercolour paintings and a confidence to paint washes and skies.

items.title: UP-CYCLE your watercolor paintings to make greeting cards.

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Turn all those practice pieces & experiments into cards to send. Impress your friends, spend less & maybe make a bit.
objectives_summary: Turn surplus paintings into lots of greeting cards.
See how many small pictures you can get out of one painting.
Learn how to look at things from a different point of view.

items.title: Paint my 3 sunsets FREE style Watercolor painting beginners.

visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor

items.headline: Learn how to paint my watercolor sunsets by following easy lessons,3 courses to paint along to and learn my techniques.
objectives_summary: You will become adept at managing watercolor washes and working with a very limited color palette

items.title: Acrylic Painting Art: Painting Techniques For Landscape Art

visible_instructors.title: Tatiana Ambrose
visible_instructors.name: Tatiana
visible_instructors.job_title: Grow your creative thinking, writing & dog business skills

items.headline: Step-by-step art techniques to create your own landscape acrylic painting. Improve your acrylic painting skills today!
objectives_summary: Master different brush techniques to create different effects on canvas
Paint along with simple steps to recreate this acrylic masterpiece
Become more comfortable with acrylic paint

items.title: Mixed Media on Canvas
items.headline: Create Mixed media designs like a pro
objectives_summary: Create gorgeous mixed media artworks

items.title: Leather Craft Beginners|Make Personalized Leather Keychains
items.headline: Make custom DIY Stamped Leather Key Chains with a design or name or  to keep, give or sell!
objectives_summary: Make custom leather key chains with your chosen designs or text.
Create leather accessories with a personal touch to keep, give or sell.
Add surface decoration to leather with stamping tools , found objects and dyes.

items.title: How to Draw the Ear - Ears Figure Drawing Anatomy Course
items.headline: How to Draw the Face - The Easy Way I Human body
objectives_summary: How to Draw the Ear
How to Draw

items.title: Paper Crafting Like A Pro: Tools, Techniques & Inspiration
items.headline: Learn about card making, mixed media, scrapbooking, journaling, Tim Holtz products, stamps, dyes, alcohol inks and more!
objectives_summary: The difference in electronic cutting machines (Cricut, Silhouette Cameo, Brother Scan n Cut) and why you don’t necessarily need one
Learn about great instructors, makers, and industry leaders, such as Tim Holtz and his product lines of:
Distress Inks, Oxide Inks, Distress Sprays, Paints, Crayons, Alcohol inks - which color medium is right for you?

items.title: Watercolour Painting - How to paint Flowers

visible_instructors.title: Anne Edwards
visible_instructors.name: Anne
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artst - MA Royal College of Art London

items.headline: Learn how to paint rain droplets on petals using watercolor techniques
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will have learned new techniques and ways of working using watercolour
By the end of this course your powers of observation will be enhanced
By the end of this course you will have become aware of an aspect of colour theory and how this effects our lives.

items.title: How to paint with Alcohol inks -  Birch Tree and Flowers
items.headline: Express and Ink these 2 wonderful and easy paintings using Alcohol Inks. Great Artist DIY Essential art project
objectives_summary: This course is for all levels of Alcohol Ink painters or crafty/creative folks looking to create. You will be able to achieve a more realistic look with Alcohol Inks.
This course is about learning to play with colors and freeing up your expectations.
Layer Alcohol Inks and create a more realistic painting with Inks.

items.title: Paper Cutting Masterclass - Create Beautiful Paper Art
items.headline: Create stunning pictures using the ancient art of paper cutting - you don't even need to be arty to master this skill!
objectives_summary: Learn the ancient art of paper cutting
Discover the insider secrets to this craft that make paper cutting so much quicker and beautiful at the same time!
Skills and techniques of paper cutting

items.title: Painting a Boat in Water

visible_instructors.title: Steve Curl
visible_instructors.name: Steve
visible_instructors.job_title: 2-Time Teacher Of The Year & Award-Winning Painter

items.headline: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee! Features a 2-time Teacher Of The Year and award-winning painter
objectives_summary: Sketch a visually engaging scene of a boat on a lake without using a reference image.
Pick sky colors according to the kind of mood you want to set for your painting.
Practice using the "wet-in-wet" technique in order to create soft blends.

items.title: How to Arrange Flowers- A Wedding Floral Design Bouquet!

items.headline: Becoming a bouquet designer how to make a wedding  bouquet using artificial roses (round bouquet) Step-by-Step
objectives_summary: You can make a round bouquet using artificial flowers "beautifully".
You can “deliver a wedding bouquet” to a bride who expects her wedding ceremony.
You can help a bride "smile".

items.title: DIY How to Make Your Own Art Doll
items.headline: A Comprehensive Guide
objectives_summary: This guide will help students to develop the skills they need to make professional quality art dolls.

items.title: Scenting in Soapmaking
items.headline: Everything you need to know to scent your soaps effectively.
objectives_summary: Learn how to use essential oils in soap
Learn how to use fragrance oils in soap
Learn about scent families and fragrant notes

items.title: Create a perfect soy wax candle
items.headline: Candle making course on how to create an ideal candle from the first try
objectives_summary: Candle making from basics to advanced
Make a range of perfect candles at home
Create most trending soy wax scented candles
